attributes.action: Not to charge alcholic drinks at 50p an alcoholic unit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Liam Donaldson wants the govt to make the govt to charge 50p a unit for alcoholic drinks to disencourage binge drinking. This is very unfair for those who, like myself like the occassional drink. For some elderly people and the low paid, having a little drink is a treat.
